levels.description:
Passive Effect: When a trap is triggered, deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all enemies in range and <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> them for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</> seconds. After a delay, trigger other Resonators within range
Active Effect: Immediately gain 1 trap
